title1: Your digital heritage will be immortal (you will not)

first.title1: Take control of what will happen when you palm it
first.details1: You will decide who will be informed of each digital asset after your death or disabling disability. All well tied.
first.title2: Register and order all your goods in a safe place
first.details2: Forget excels, words and notebooks. A secure app with all your important digital information that you can access 24/7.
first.details3: The family is what remains after distributing the inheritance. Save pain and suffering to your loved ones, leaving everything clear and in order (unless you want to bitch them).

second.details4: Children are the worst off in the sudden deaths of their fathers or mothers. Guarantee your future and leave nothing to chance.
second.title5: Leave a good memory in your customers
second.details5: Choose between clients who will curse you for not complying with what they already paid or clients who will remember you as a great professional and person for finding a solution to their business situation.
